      • generateOAuthSignature

        public java.lang.String generateOAuthSignature(java.lang.String secret,
                                               java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> formData,
                                               java.lang.String httpMethod,
                                               java.lang.String baseURL)
                                        throws java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException,
                                               java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                                               java.security.InvalidKeyException
        Description copied from interface: LTIControllerInterface
        Generate the OAuth HMAC-SHA1 signature defined by OAuth.
        Specified by:
        generateOAuthSignature in interface LTIControllerInterface
        Parameters:
        secret - the secret stored in database
        formData - the content of the request used to recalculate the HMAC.
        httpMethod - the HTTP method of the request used to recalculate the HMAC.
        baseURL - the complete url of the request used to recalculate the HMAC.
        Returns:
        the signature
        Throws:
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        java.security.InvalidKeyException
